translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen,
this is the moment we've been waiting for. The presenta--
translation.de: darauf haben wir gewartet: die Überreich…

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight?
-Daniel LaRusso's gonna fight! -[audience cheers]
Now, isn't this what it's all about, folks?
translation.de: Und darum geht es hier doch, oder?

translation.en: [boy 1] Come on, Daniel! Come on, Daniel!
-Fight! -[Johnny] Hyah!
[man 1] Come on, Daniel! Get him!
[referee] Turn. Kneel.
[man 2] Hey, Johnny, you're a cream puff!
Sweep the leg.
You have a problem with that?
No, Sensei.
No mercy.
[boy 1] All right, two points!
That's two points, LaRusso. Lawrence, nothing.
Ready? Fight!
[referee] One point, Lawrence!
[official] Point, Lawrence. 2-2.
[boy 2] Get him a body bag! Yeah!
-[referee] Illegal contact to the knee. -[boy 2] Finish him, Johnny!
[announcer] Whoever wins the next point will be our new champion!
translation.de: Wer den nächsten Punkt holt, wird der neue Champion.

translation.en: You finish him, Johnny! Finish him!
[announcer] The new champion, Daniel LaRusso!
Hey, I'm Miguel. My family and I just moved into 109.
translation.de: Ich bin Miguel. Wir sind gerade in die 109 eingezogen.

translation.en: Great. More immigrants.
Actually, we're from Riverside.
I was wondering if you were having trouble with your water pressure, 'cause I know our sink's being weird right now and…
translation.de: Ich frage mich, ob Sie auch Probleme mit dem Wasserdruck haben, denn wir…

translation.en: Oh, bottles go in the blue bins.
Listen, Menudo, I've lived in this shithole for over ten years.
translation.de: Hör zu, menudo, ich lebe seit zehn Jahren in dieser Bruchbude.

translation.en: The pipe's don't work. The fountain's full of piss.
The only good thing here is that I don't have to talk to anybody. So, nice knowing you.
translation.de: Aber immerhin muss ich hier mit niemandem reden. Leb wohl.

translation.en: OK, well…
have a nice day…
-[car door squeals loudly] -…I guess.
[Johnny] You've got to be kidding me.
Not another one.
♪ Ha ha, yeah! ♪
[woman] Creep.
Sick.
-Hey! -[kid] Gotcha.
-What the hell is this? -Don't worry, it'll be level. I'm just lining it up.
translation.de: -Was ist das? -Keine Sorge, ich richte ihn aus.

translation.en: You put it on the wrong wall! I said the wall across from the door.
translation.de: Das ist die falsche Wand. Ich sagte, die Wand gegenüber der Tür.

translation.en: -This is the wall across from the door. -Not that door, idiot. The door.
translation.de: -Das ist die Wand gegenüber der Tür. -Nicht die, Idiot. Die Tür.

translation.en: Just move the TV. I have company coming over.
translation.de: Machen Sie es richtig, ich kriege Gäste.

translation.en: Hold on. I'll have to fill the holes, remeasure, match the paint.
translation.de: Ich müsste die Löcher verschließen, Maß nehmen, die Farbe anpassen.

translation.en: It'll take an hour to get to the hardware store.
That's not my problem.
I'm not the dummy who put the TV on, literally,
translation.de: Ich habe den Fernseher nicht an die einzige unpassende Wand im Haus gehängt.

translation.en: the only wall in the house that a TV would not go.
translation.de: an die einzige unpassende Wand im Haus gehängt.

translation.en: Why can't a TV go on this…
Look, I'll come first thing in the morning and put it just the way you want it.
translation.de: Ich komme morgen früh und mache alles, wie Sie es wollen.

translation.en: I just can't do it now.
That's just great. Not bad enough you took a shit in my powder room.
translation.de: Super. Als ob es nicht reicht, in meinem Bad zu kacken.

translation.en: -You said that's where I should go. -I didn't know you'd take a shit!
translation.de: -Ich sollte es doch benutzen. -Nicht zum Scheißen.

translation.en: OK, we'll figure this out, all right? Just quit bitching at me.
translation.de: Okay, wir kriegen das hin. Aber hören Sie auf rumzuzicken.

translation.en: What did you just call me?
No, no, no! I didn't call her a bitch. I said she was bitching at me.
translation.de: Nein, ich sagte nicht "Zicke", sie sollte nur nicht herumzicken.

translation.en: There's a difference.
You're firing me because of that bitch?
translation.de: Sie feuern mich wegen der Zicke?

translation.en: You know what? I hated this damn job anyway.
translation.de: Ich habe den Kackjob eh gehasst.

translation.en: You better pay me what you owe me, Mike.
translation.de: Zahlen Sie mich ja aus, Mike.

translation.en: [man on radio] Banzai!
[chuckles] I'm Daniel LaRusso.
And at LaRusso Auto, we kick the competi--
translation.de: Und wir von LaRusso Auto kicken die Konkurrenz…

translation.en: That one.
Aren't you gonna wear gloves?
[in Spanish] Where's the Pepto-Bismol?
[in Spanish] Over there.
Can you put that on a plate?
[in English] My grandma's not feeling well.
Didn't ask. C'mon, what's Spanish for "Just give me my damn slice"?
translation.de: -Meiner Oma geht's schlecht. -Will keiner wissen. Was heißt "Gib einfach her" auf Spanisch?

translation.en: [in Spanish] Fucking idiot. He probably has a little dick. [laughs]
translation.de: So ein Idiot. Hat bestimmt einen kleinen Schwanz.

translation.en: [in English] What did you just say?
-What did he say? -You don't wanna know.
-I know it's something bad. Just tell me. -Uh, he said you have a tiny…
translation.de: -Es war was Schlimmes. Sag es mir. -Er sagte, Sie hätten einen kleinen…

translation.en: He said I have a tiny wang?
Tell him he has a tiny wang.
-[in English] I speak English, asshole. -Oh really?
Yo, Brucks, get the light beer this time. Gotta cut weight for the meet.
translation.de: Brucks, hol Light-Bier. Ich muss vor dem Wettkampf abnehmen.

translation.en: -Hundo P, son! -[boy 2] Damn right.
[boy 3] Man, you should get some condoms too.
Finish up and then beat it!
-Excuse me? -[woman] This is my mart.
You ain't hustling no coin at my mart.
I'm not hustling. I'm not homeless!
translation.de: Ich schnorre nicht, ich bin kein Penner.

translation.en: That's my car.
[boy 2] What the hell are you doing? Why you gotta blow up my spot?
translation.de: Was soll das? Wieso lässt du mich auffliegen?

translation.en: -[Miguel] Dude, I-- -He thought we were in college.
[Miguel] I didn't know you were trying to buy beer. Sorry.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass ihr Bier holt.

translation.en: -[Brucks] Yes, let's go. -[boy 3] What the hell are you doing?
-Ooh, what do we got here? -[boy 4] What do you got? Pepto.
translation.de: -Was ist das? -Ja, was hast du da? Pepto.

translation.en: [boy 3] Oh shit. Someone has frickin' diarrhea!
translation.de: Oh Scheiße, da hat jemand Dünnschiss.

translation.en: [Brucks] Hey, we should call him 'Rhea.
Give it back, dude. It's for my grandma!
translation.de: Gib her, das ist für meine Oma.

translation.en: [boy 2] Oh, it's for your grandma? Shit, I'm sorry, man.
translation.de: Oh, für deine Oma? Scheiße, das tut mir leid.

translation.en: Hey, you want it? Hey, you can take all that shit.
translation.de: Du willst es? Dann kriegst du alles…

translation.en: -Take that! Yeah. -[boys laughing]
Bitch.
Asshole.
-[Brucks] Ooh! -[boy 2] What'd you say, 'Rhea?
I… I didn't say anything.
[boy 4] That's brute, Ky.
[boy 3] Yeah. Or what?
-[Ky] You crying? Where you going, pussy? -[Miguel groans]
-[boys snicker] -[Johnny] Hey!
Watch the car, man.
Who's this dude?
-Just leave the dork alone. -[Ky] What?
You see this guy? Eating his dinner at the mini-mart like a bum.
translation.de: Guckt euch den an. Frisst vor dem Laden wie ein Penner.

translation.en: -[boys laugh] -[Ky] Wait, I think I know this guy. He's the jerk-off that cleaned my dad's septic tank.
translation.de: Den kenne ich. Der Idiot hat bei meinem Dad die Klärgrube geleert.

translation.en: That explains why he smells like shit.
Trust me, you are pissing off the wrong guy on the wrong day, all right?
translation.de: Ihr macht den falschen Typ am falschen Tag dumm an.

translation.en: -[Ky] Really? -Yeah, really.
Get the hell out of here, loser.
Let's get him.
[Brucks] Get off me!
-Holy shit. How did you-- -[Ky roars]
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.de: Was ist los? Kriegst du keine Luft?

translation.en: Is that all you got, ladies?
[Brucks] Come on, Ky.
-Let's go. -[Ky] Get off me!
What's the matter? Having trouble breathing?
translation.de: Was ist los? Kriegst du keine Luft?

translation.en: [cop] Hey, get off the kid!
-[Johnny screams] -[Miguel] Hey! It's not his fault!
[Miguel] Hey, I just wanted to say thank you.
All right, well, you said it.
translation.de: Gut, das hast du ja jetzt.

translation.en: So, last night, was that, like, Tae Kwon Do or jujitsu or MMA or something?
translation.de: War das gestern Taekwondo oder Jiu-Jitsu oder MMA oder so was?

translation.en: It's karate. Old-school karate.
-Do you think you could teach me? -What? No.
Come on. When school starts, those guys will make my life miserable.
translation.de: Wenn die Schule losgeht, werden die mich quälen.

translation.en: It's not my problem.
Look, if I just knew a little bit of what you knew, then I would be--
translation.de: Wenn ich etwas von dem könnte, was Sie können, dann…

translation.en: Forget it. I don't do karate anymore, all right? Besides, I need to find a job.
translation.de: Vergiss es, ich mache kein Karate mehr. Außerdem brauche ich einen Job.

translation.en: Well, you could open your own karate school.
-It's called a dojo. -You could open your own dojo.
translation.de: -Es heißt Dojo. -Dann halt ein eigenes Dojo.

translation.en: Look, I'm not getting into this with you. I'm not even sure I'm allowed to be around kids right now.
translation.de: Keine Diskussion. Ich darf vermutlich nicht mal mit Kids reden.

translation.en: All right, you want my advice? Stop being so annoying.
translation.de: Willst du einen Tipp? Nerv die Leute nicht so.

translation.en: Maybe you'll stop getting your ass kicked.
translation.de: Vielleicht lässt man dich dann in Ruhe.

translation.en: OK.
[woman on TV] …and have a life before I pass away.
translation.de: ...und ein Leben haben, bevor ich sterbe.

translation.en: Any help Chuck can give her, we'd appreciate.
You got Encore?
Yes, ma'am. That's correct, Your Honor.
Who the hell are you?
You know those little red stickers that say "further reduced"?
translation.de: Kennst du diese roten Aufkleber, auf denen "Reduziert" steht?

translation.en: That means "spoiled."
You know that, right?
You're eating bad meat, boy.
What the are you doing in my apartment, Sid? Oh, that's some "thank you."
translation.de: -Was tust du in meiner Wohnung, Sid? -Ach, so bedankst du dich.

translation.en: Who do you think bailed you out? Again.
translation.de: Wer hat wohl deine Kaution bezahlt? Mal wieder?

translation.en: I never asked you for anything.
I think that little incident at Applebee's
translation.de: Ich dachte, nach dem Vorfall bei Applebee's

translation.en: would've taught you to keep your hands to yourself.
You know…
when I met your mom,
she really knocked my socks off.
Beautiful.
Blonde.
Tan.
Tight.
-[groans] -[Sid] Little did I know I'd be taking care of her schmuck kid forever.
translation.de: Konnte ja nicht ahnen, dass ich ihren Bengel zeitlebens am Hals haben würde.

translation.en: [Johnny] Yeah, Sid, you were the stepfather of the century.
translation.de: Ja, du warst der Stiefvater des Jahrhunderts.

translation.en: Well, high praise, coming from a world-class daddy like you.
translation.de: So ein Lob von einem Spitzen-Daddy wie dir bedeutet natürlich viel.

translation.en: How old is Robby now, 15, 16?
-When's the last time you saw him? -Just get the hell out of here.
translation.de: -Wann hast du ihn zuletzt gesehen? -Hau ab.

translation.en: I'll get the hell out when I'm goddamn good and ready!
translation.de: Ich haue ab, wenn ich fertig bin!

translation.en: -[woman] Sid. -[Sid] What?
-Blood pressure! -Keep watching your bullshit judge show,
translation.de: -Sid. Dein Blutdruck. -Was? Schau deine blöde Gerichtsshow, Rhonda.

translation.en: will you, Rhonda?
And stay out of this!
Jesus, God.
This is why I'm here.
What's this?
You know, I told your mama I'd take care of you always,
translation.de: Ich habe deiner Mama versprochen, mich immer um dich zu kümmern,

translation.en: but in this case,
I think even she would cut me some slack.
translation.de: hätte sogar sie Nachsicht mit mir.

translation.en: I'm buying you out of my life.
translation.de: Ich kaufe mich von dir frei.

translation.en: I'd rather be homeless than take money from you. Oh, well, hell. Yeah, OK.
translation.de: -Lieber obdachlos als dein Geld nehmen. -Ach so, na dann. Okay.

translation.en: Lunchtime!
Call Art's.
See if they got the belly lox.
I'd say… get your life in order, but, uh…
translation.de: Ich wollte sagen, krieg dein Leben auf die Reihe, aber…

translation.en: at this point, you're like the meat in your fridge.
translation.de: …momentan bist du wie das Fleisch in deinem Kühlschrank.

translation.en: Chappy! Chappy, where are you? Just put in that tape. That's an order!
translation.de: -Chappy, wo bist du? -Hör das Band. Das ist ein Befehl!

translation.en: -Nothing you can do about me. -[man 1] Chappy, I want to help you!
translation.de: -Du kannst nichts mehr tun. -Ich will dir helfen!

translation.en: Where are you?
[Chappy] Climb high, like I told you!
-[alarm buzzing on television] -Doug, I ain't gonna make it.
-[explosion on television] -Chappy!
[man on tape] A bunch of things must have gone wrong if you're listening to this.
translation.de: Falls du das hörst, muss einiges schiefgegangen sein.

translation.en: Whatever happened, I know you must be real scared.
translation.de: Was auch passiert ist, du hast sicher Angst.

translation.en: Right now, you're probably filled with all the doubts in the world.
translation.de: Zurzeit erfüllen dich vermutlich alle Zweifel dieser Welt.

translation.en: But I'm gonna tell you something, Dougie.
translation.de: Aber ich sag dir was, Dougie.

translation.en: God doesn't give people things He doesn't want 'em to use.
translation.de: Wenn Gott dir etwas gibt, will er, dass du es benutzt.

translation.en: And He gave you the touch.
translation.de: Und Er hat dir das Händchen gegeben.

translation.en: It's a power you have inside of you,
translation.de: Eine Kraft, die in dir steckt,

translation.en: down there where you keep your guts, boy.
It's all you need to blast your way in and get back what they took from you.
translation.de: Damit kannst du zurückholen, was sie dir genommen haben.

translation.en: Daniel LaRusso here for LaRusso Auto,
translation.de: Daniel LaRusso hier, von LaRusso Auto,

translation.en: bringing you specials on all of our inventory.
translation.de: mit Sonderpreisen quer durch unser Angebot.

translation.en: We have an excess of Jeep Grand Cherokees priced to go.
translation.de: Wir haben ein paar Jeep Grand Cherokees zu Top-Konditionen.

translation.en: Get a lease for only…
Nah. Make that… Chop!
Yes, we are chopping prices on all of our Hondas, Nissans, Acuras, and Audis.
translation.de: Ja, wir pulverisieren die Preise für alle Hondas, Nissans, Acuras und Audis.

translation.en: So come visit any of our locations in Tarzana, Woodland Hills,
translation.de: Besuchen Sie unsere Filialen in Tarzana, Woodland Hills,

translation.en: North Hollywood or Sherman Oaks.
And as always, every customer leaves with their very own bonsai tree.
translation.de: Und wie immer nimmt jeder unserer Kunden einen eigenen Bonsai mit nach Hause.

translation.en: LaRusso Auto Group. We kick the competition.
translation.de: LaRusso Auto Group. Wir kicken die Konkurrenz weg.

translation.en: -Yeah! -All right!
-[man] Hai! -[students] Hyah! -Hai! -Hyah! -Hai! -Hyah!
♪ These daydreams ♪
[Johnny] I got second place.
[man] Second place is no place! You're off the team!
translation.de: -Ich bin Zweiter. -Zweiter bedeutet nichts! -Du bist raus! -Ich gab mein Bestes.

translation.en: -[Johnny] That sucks! I did my best. -What did you say?
translation.de: -Du bist raus! -Ich gab mein Bestes. -Was sagst du? -Ich gab mein Bestes.

translation.en: -[Johnny] I said I did my best! -You're nothing! You lost! You're a loser!
translation.de: -Was sagst du? -Ich gab mein Bestes. Du bist ein Nichts! Ein Loser!

translation.en: -[Johnny] No, you're the loser, man. -Oh, I'm the loser, huh?
translation.de: -Nein, Sie sind der Loser. -Ich der Loser?

translation.en: Yeah.
-Now who's the loser? -[Johnny] You know, you're really sick.
translation.de: -Wer ist jetzt der Loser? -Sie sind echt krank.

translation.en: -Hey! [Johnny choking] -Hey, come on!
-Hey, what are you doing? -Don't…
How does second place feel now, huh?
translation.de: Wie fühlt sich der zweite Platz an?

translation.en: -[boy 1] Come on! He can't breathe. -Mind your business!
[boy 2] You're gonna kill him! [boy 1] Sensei, please! You're hurting him!
translation.de: -Sie bringen ihn um. -Sensei, bitte, Sie tun ihm weh.

translation.en: [man] How does second place feel now, huh?
translation.de: Wie fühlt sich der zweite Platz an?

translation.en: -[girl gasps] -Oh my God.
I told you, you shouldn't be on your phone.
-What the-- -[liquor bottle smashes]
-What are we gonna do? -We have to call the police.
-We can't! My parents will kill me! -What the hell are you doing?
translation.de: -Dann killen mich meine Eltern. -Was habt ihr getan?

translation.en: -What are you doing? Open the door! -[girls screaming] Open the door!
translation.de: Was habt ihr getan? Macht die Tür auf!

translation.en: Drive! Drive!
Hey! Where do you think you're going? Where do you think you're going?
Shit!
Oh, come o--
-Take care of her. She's a classic. -Mm-hmm.
-Hey, where do I pick it up? -It's on the card.
translation.de: -Wo hole ich ihn ab? -Steht auf der Karte.

translation.en: [Johnny] LaRusso?
No, no, no.
Hey! Hey!
Oh, come on.
How you doing? Would you be interested in--
No.
[woman] You're all set.
-Have a great day. -[man 1] Thank you.
Hi, welcome to LaRusso.
How can I help you? Hi, I just need to pick up my car.
translation.de: -Wie kann ich helfen? -Hi, ich will mein Auto abholen.

translation.en: I'm in a bit of a hurry.
Oh, this came in last night?
It'll be a couple of weeks, but we'll call you with an estimate.
translation.de: Das dauert zwei Wochen, wir rufen Sie an.

translation.en: No, my car was not supposed to come here. I want it towed to a different body shop.
translation.de: Nein, mein Auto ist hier falsch. Es soll in eine andere Werkstatt.

translation.en: Why?
We have the number one service team in the Valley.
translation.de: Wir sind die Nummer eins im Valley.

translation.en: We beat all prices. We kick the competition.
translation.de: Die Günstigsten. Wir kicken die Konkurrenz weg.

translation.en: I've heard it a million times. I just prefer to do my business elsewhere.
translation.de: Ja, das kenne ich. Aber ich will woandershin.

translation.en: [man 2] And here are the watering instructions.
translation.de: Das sind die Hinweise zum Gießen.

translation.en: Thanks for being returning customers.
Before you go, Mr. LaRusso wanted to thank you personally.
translation.de: Mr. LaRusso möchte Ihnen noch persönlich danken.

translation.en: Let me go get him.
-Can you hurry it up? I gotta go. -[woman] Hold on.
Um, it says your car is in one of our intake lots.
translation.de: Ich schaue, auf welchem unserer Höfe

translation.en: -I'll figure out which one. -You know what? I'll come back tomorrow.
[woman] But, sir, I--
[Daniel] Johnny?
Johnny Lawrence! I… I… I knew it was you!
translation.de: Johnny Lawrence, hab dich gleich erkannt.

translation.en: Holy… How the hell are you?
translation.de: Mann… Wie geht es dir so?

translation.en: -Hey, man. -[chuckles]
[Daniel] Oh my God, look at you.
You still got those golden locks, eh?
God, this is crazy. How you been?
translation.de: Das ist ja ein Ding. Wie läuft's?

translation.en: -Great, man. Thanks, I've been great. -That's great.
Anoush, come here! Louie, get over here! I want you to meet somebody.
translation.de: Anoush, komm her. Louie. Ich will euch jemanden vorstellen.

translation.en: -I gotta go. -No, no, no. This is Johnny Lawrence.
translation.de: -Ich muss los. -Nein. Das ist Johnny Lawrence.

translation.en: He and I go way back. Right, buddy? This guy was the toughest dude in my high school.
translation.de: Er und ich kennen uns sehr lange, oder? Er war der härteste Hund der Schule.

translation.en: When I first moved here from Jersey, he and I… we got into a little bit.
translation.de: Als ich damals aus New Jersey herzog, hatten wir ein bisschen Stress.

translation.en: This guy really had it in for me. Well, you did move in on my girl.
translation.de: -Er hatte mich auf dem Kieker. -Du hast mein Mädel angemacht.

translation.en: Well, she actually wasn't really your girl anymore, was she?
translation.de: Na ja, sie war eigentlich nicht mehr dein Mädel, oder?

translation.en: I mean…
All right. That's all water under the bridge.
Wait. Is this the karate guy, the guy from the tournament?
translation.de: Ist das der Karate-Typ von dem Turnier?

translation.en: Oh, this is the guy whose ass you kicked.
translation.de: Du hast ihm in den Arsch getreten.

translation.en: [Daniel] Uh, listen, it was a really close match.
translation.de: Na ja, es war ein sehr enger Kampf.

translation.en: But if you wanna get technical… I kicked his face.
translation.de: Aber um genau zu sein: ins Gesicht getreten.

translation.en: -[Daniel, Louie laughing] -I'm just busting your chops.
It was an illegal kick.
Oh, illegal? Really? Come on. What about that elbow to my knee?
translation.de: Ach, echt? Und was war mit deinem Ellbogen?

translation.en: Yeah, I got a warning. You got the win.
Whoa, whoa, whoa! No fighting in the showroom, guys.
[Daniel] Come on. All right, back to work.
-Nice meeting you. -Get back to work. Enough reminiscing, right?
So, what brings you in? You're looking for a new a ride?
He wants his car towed to a different body shop.
translation.de: Er will in eine andere Werkstatt.

translation.en: Oh no, Johnny. We got the best prices in town.
translation.de: Nein, Johnny. Wir haben die besten Preise.

translation.en: That crook at Cole's on Van Nuys, he'll try to screw you over.
translation.de: Bei Cole's on Van Nuys wirst du abgezockt.

translation.en: Sheila, let me see the estimate.
A Pontiac?
-Firebird? -Yeah.
Wow, someone did a real number on this thing.
Maybe it's time for an upgrade. Why don't we walk the lot? I'll give you a deal on a certified pre-owned--
translation.de: Vielleicht wechselst du? Schau dich um. Wir haben tolle gebrauchte…

translation.en: I just want my car.
All right, all right. You got it, all right?
translation.de: Also gut, du kriegst es, okay?

translation.en: Let me see how low I can get this repair.
Friends and family… my own personal code.
translation.de: Mein persönlicher Rabatt für Freunde und Familie…

translation.en: You know what? It's on the house.
translation.de: Weißt du was? Geht aufs Haus.

translation.en: -No way. I don't need your charity. -No, you'd be doing me a favor.
Our guys aren't used to working on a car like this. They could use the practice. You could use the repairs.
translation.de: Meine Jungs kennen solche Autos nicht, so könnten sie üben.

translation.en: -This is a win-win. -I said I'll handle it.
All right.
OK, but it's… John, it's gonna cost more than the car is worth.
translation.de: Es wird aber mehr kosten, als der Wagen wert ist.

translation.en: Listen, don't worry about it. It's my pleasure, all right?
translation.de: Keine Sorge, es wäre mir eine Freude.

translation.en: -All right. -OK? Just hang here a second.
I got something for you. One minute.
-Hey, Dad! -[Daniel] Look who's here.
-[screaming] -What are you doing? Open the door!
translation.de: Was habt ihr getan? Macht auf!

translation.en: -I'm good. -You gotta be kidding me.
Of course. Go ahead. In the office.
-[girl] See you later. -OK.
Hey, Johnny, wait up!
Johnny! Wait up.
Every customer gets one.
And, hey, look, I don't blame you for what happened back in the day.
translation.de: Und hey, hör mal, ich gebe dir für damals keine Schuld.

translation.en: All right, I know that wasn't you. It was Cobra Kai.
translation.de: Du warst es nicht, es war Cobra Kai.

translation.en: We're all better off without it, am I right?
Take care of yourself, and I'll call you when the car's ready, OK?
translation.de: Mach's gut. Ich rufe dich an wegen der Abholung.

translation.en: This is crazy! You look… You look… It's good to see you, man.
translation.de: Das ist Wahnsinn, du siehst… Schön dich zu sehen.

translation.en: Are you sure you're ready?
'Cause once you go down this path, there's no turning back.
translation.de: Denn später gibt es kein Zurück mehr.

translation.en: -You're gonna be my karate teacher? -No.
I'm gonna be your sensei.
I'm gonna teach you the style of karate that was taught to me,
translation.de: Ich lehre dich das Karate, das ich gelehrt wurde.

translation.en: a method of fighting your pussy generation desperately needs.
translation.de: Eine Kampfart, die deine Pussy-Generation braucht.

translation.en: -[man] Good luck. It's all yours. -All right.
translation.de: Alles Gute, das war's. Alles klar.

translation.en: I'm not just gonna teach you how to conquer your fears.
translation.de: Ich lehre dich nicht nur, furchtlos zu sein.

translation.en: I'm gonna teach you how to awaken the snake within you.
translation.de: Ich werde die Schlange in dir erwecken.

translation.en: And once you do that,
translation.de: Und sobald sie wach ist, wird man sich vor dir fürchten.

translation.en: you'll be the one who's feared.
translation.de: Und sobald sie wach ist, wird man sich vor dir fürchten. ZUERST SCHLAGEN - HART SCHLAGEN KEINE GNADE

translation.en: You'll build strength.
You'll learn discipline.
And when the time is right,
you'll strike back.
